description:
Elevate your winter style with 'The Fjord' beanie. Crafted with high-quality fine acrylic for softness, warmth, and durability, it can be worn cuffed or unrolled for a unique look.

  • Customize your look by wearing it cuffed and classic or unrolled for a taller appearance
  • Stylish woven clip label at the side
name: Coal The Fjord - Unisex
